Service Details: Provides a range of rehabilitation services to clients of all ages that include:- pediatric services (Autism services, early language development); speech sound therapy (articulation, phonology, apraxia of speech) - language therapy (expressive and receptive language skills)- stroke and brain injury rehabilitation- dysphagia assessment and intervention- cognitive communication intervention (conversational topic maintenance, attending to others, memory, solving problems, and planning)- social skills training- reading and writing therapy- voice therapy- fluency / stuttering therapy- accent reduction therapy- works with families and caregivers of individuals with communication difficulties (due to stroke, neurodegenerative diseases, and dementia to help them find new ways to communicate effectively
